level.title: Environment Variables
level.description: Learn to set, use, and manage environment variables

exercises.title: View All Environment Variables
exercises.description: Use 'env' command to display all environment variables.
hints: Shows variables like PATH, HOME, USER

exercises.title: View Specific Variable
exercises.description: Use 'echo $PATH' to display the value of the PATH variable.
hints: PATH contains directories where commands are found

exercises.title: Set a New Variable
exercises.description: Create a variable called 'MYNAME' with your name as value.

exercises.title: Use Variable in Command
exercises.description: Create variable MESSAGE='Hello' and use echo to display it.
hints: The $ lets you access the value

exercises.title: Export Variable
exercises.description: Use 'export' to make a variable available to child processes.
hints: export makes variables available to subshells
Without export, variable is local only
